issue.title: [CF 74] Possible Intercept Bug
issue.body:
ATTACHING A SAVED VARIABLES FILE/SCREENSHOT WILL GET YOUR TICKET ANSWERED 10 TIMES FASTER

Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<ACOOUNTNAME>/<REALMNAME>/<CHARNAME>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

What steps will reproduce the problem?
Cyb, I think there is a bug with the icon for the warrior ability Intercept. When set to 'show icon when usable' and 'power check', the icon always shows whether you have power (rage in this case) or not. Strangely, this bug only seems to happen when you target yourself or friendlies.

What is the expected output?   Icon should follow 'unusable' rules

What version of the product are you using?   2.2.3a


> Posted by CurseForge user Mantooth555 | Imported from CurseForge issue #74 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user Mantooth555

1) You are not using 2.2.3a, but rather 2.1.2

2) Your intercept icon is set to always show, instead of only when usable like you say it is.

3) I am unable to reproduce this.

4) You say that the expected output is that it should follow unusable rules, but you say it is set to show when usable, when it is actually set to always show.
